name: Ball Escapes from Factory
description:
This game is about a Ball who gained consciousness and decides to escape from the factory. You have to prevent the Lava from touching you. Control your speed and roll to freedom.

CONTROLS

  1. W,A,S,D- Movement
  2. Space -Jump
  3. Escape-Quit Game
  4. R-Restart

Steps to Setup the game.

  1. Download the BallEscape.rar
  2. Extract the files
  3. Launch BallEscape
